channel.title: Adam Simon on The Huddle
channel.description: Recent content in Adam Simon on The Huddle

item.title: D-Line Handlers
item.description: I should start by saying that I am an incredibly blessed ultimate player. For the past few years, I have had the coolest job in ultimate. “Go cover whoever you want, and when we get the disc, get it moving, then put it up. Your receivers will be Beau, Jolian, Mangan and Martin.” Uhhh, yes please? (I imagine Jeremy Cram felt the same way when he was choosing between Nord, Chase, Andrew Fleming and Mark Stone).
